TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyPressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Defines the event arguments for KeyPress events. Instances of this class are cached: KeyPressEventArgs should only be used inside the relevant event, unless manually cloned.
